description: This source file implements methods for the TokenClient class within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. The methods are intended to retrieve platform and authentication tokens, but currently only contain placeholders indicating unimplemented functionality.

classes.name: TokenClient
classes.description: Client class responsible for handling token retrieval operations. The class contains methods to obtain platform and authentication tokens, which are currently unimplemented.

methods.name: bool GetPlatformToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & xact,const std::string & sat,std::string & outTokenJson,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Method meant to retrieve a platform token based on application ID and transaction details. Currently, it logs invocation and returns 'not implemented'.

methods.name: bool GetAuthToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & sat,std::string & outTokenJson,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Method meant to retrieve an authentication token based on application ID and sat. Currently, it logs invocation and returns 'not implemented'.
